verses.verse: <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8416>praise,<s%> <S%H2790>don't<s%> remain silent,

for they have <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%> against <S%H1696>me.<s%> They have spoken to me with a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
They have also <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against me without a <S%H2600>cause.<s%>
In return for my <S%H160>love,<s%> they are my <S%H7853>adversaries;<s%> but I am in <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
They have <S%H7760>rewarded<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H8135>hatred<s%> for my <S%H160>love.<s%>
<S%H6485>Set<s%> a wicked <S%H7563>man<s%> over <S%H7854>him.<s%> Let an adversary <S%H5975>stand<s%> at his right <S%H3225>hand.<s%>
When he is <S%H8199>judged,<s%> let him come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7563>guilty.<s%> Let his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be turned into <S%H2401>sin.<s%>
Let his <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4592>few.<s%> Let <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H6486>office.<s%>
Let his <S%H1121>children<s%> be <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> a <S%H490>widow.<s%>
Let his <S%H1121>children<s%> be <S%H5128>wandering<s%> <S%H5128>beggars.<s%> <S%H7592><s%> Let them be <S%H1875>sought<s%> from their <S%H2723>ruins.<s%>
Let the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> <S%H5367>seize<s%> all that he <S%H2114>has.<s%> Let strangers <S%H962>plunder<s%> the fruit of his <S%H3018>labor.<s%>
Let there be no one to <S%H4900>extend<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H2603>him,<s%> neither let there be anyone to have pity on his fatherless <S%H3490>children.<s%>
Let his <S%H319>posterity<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%> In the <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H312>following<s%> let their <S%H8034>name<s%> be blotted <S%H4229>out.<s%>
Let the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H2403>Don't<s%> let the sin of his <S%H517>mother<s%> be blotted <S%H4229>out.<s%>
Let them be before <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> that he may cut <S%H3772>off<s%> their <S%H2143>memory<s%> from the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

because he <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember to <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> but <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H3512>broken<s%> in <S%H3824>heart,<s%> to kill <S%H4191>them.<s%>
<S%H157>Yes,<s%> he loved <S%H7045>cursing,<s%> and it <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2654>him.<s%> He didn't delight in <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> and it was far from <S%H7368>him.<s%>

He <S%H3847>clothed<s%> himself also with <S%H7045>cursing<s%> as with his <S%H4055>garment.<s%> It <S%H935>came<s%> into his <S%H7130>inward<s%> parts like <S%H4325>water,<s%> like <S%H8081>oil<s%> into his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
Let it be to him as the <S%H899>clothing<s%> with which he <S%H5844>covers<s%> <S%H4206>himself,<s%> for the belt that is <S%H8548>always<s%> around <S%H2296>him.<s%>
This is the <S%H6468>reward<s%> of my <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> of those who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
But <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H136>me,<s%> Yahweh the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> for your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2617>sake,<s%> because your loving kindness is <S%H2896>good,<s%> deliver <S%H5337>me;<s%>
for I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2490>wounded<s%> within <S%H7130>me.<s%>
I fade <S%H1980>away<s%> like an <S%H5186>evening<s%> <S%H6738>shadow.<s%> I am shaken <S%H5287>off<s%> like a <S%H697>locust.<s%>
My <S%H1290>knees<s%> are <S%H3782>weak<s%> through <S%H6685>fasting.<s%> My <S%H1320>body<s%> is <S%H3584>thin<s%> and lacks <S%H8081>fat.<s%>
I have also become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to <S%H7200>them.<s%> When they see <S%H5128>me,<s%> they shake their <S%H7218>head.<s%>
<S%H5826>Help<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, my <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me according to your loving <S%H2617>kindness;<s%>
that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this is your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> that <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, have done <S%H6213>it.<s%>
They may <S%H7043>curse,<s%> but you <S%H1288>bless.<s%> When they <S%H6965>arise,<s%> they will be <S%H954>shamed,<s%> but your <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
Let my <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H3639>dishonor.<s%> Let them <S%H5844>cover<s%> themselves with their own <S%H1322>shame<s%> as with a <S%H4598>robe.<s%>
I will give <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> <S%H1984>Yes,<s%> I will praise him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7227>multitude.<s%>
For he will <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> him from those who <S%H8199>judge<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
